|brand = Lite-On |model = WCBN606 |submodelappend = <!-- yes for space --> |submodel = AH |revision = (HP) |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = October 10, 2012 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Lite-On_WCBN606AH_(HP) |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = Mini PCIe |if_bus_version = <!-- ie. 1.0, 1.1, 2.0, 2.2 --> |ifconnector = Mini PCIe |formfactor = (half)
|vendor_id = 168c |device_id = 002b |subvendor_id = 103c |subdevice_id = 1461 |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = PPD-AR5B195 |icid = 4104A-AR5B195 |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 68:A3:C4
|chip1 = Atheros;AR9285; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 10/09/2009 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->

}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This device uses the [[Atheros AR5B195]] / WB195 reference design.
HP SPS# 593127-001, AS# 592775-001
Bluetooth used USB-bus: Vendor ID: 0x0cf3 ([[Atheros]]), Product ID: 0x3005 :Windows: USB\VID_0CF3&PID_3005
